column.name: limesobject
column.query: SELECT ?item WHERE { ?item ?label '%%limesobject%%'@de. SERVICE wikibase:label { bd:serviceParam wikibase:language 'en'. } FILTER(STRSTARTS(STR(?item), "http://www.wikidata.org/entity/"))}

column.name: limestown
column.query: SELECT ?item WHERE { ?item ?label '%%limestown%%'@de. SERVICE wikibase:label { bd:serviceParam wikibase:language 'en'. } FILTER(STRSTARTS(STR(?item), "http://www.wikidata.org/entity/"))}

column.name: limestownpard
column.query: SELECT ?item WHERE { ?item ?label '%%limestownpard%%'@de. SERVICE wikibase:label { bd:serviceParam wikibase:language 'en'. } FILTER(STRSTARTS(STR(?item), "http://www.wikidata.org/entity/"))}
